The reduction of a dislocated wrist should only be performed by a qualified medical professional who can assess the specific injury, administer appropriate pain relief, and ensure that the reduction is performed safely and effectively. The amount of force required varies depending on the individual, the type and severity of the dislocation, and the surrounding tissues.
